verbose_text: Following the dissipated DeltaPsim and long lasting mPTP opening, HG increased the leakage of cyt-c from the mitochondria into the cytoplasm, and cyt-c was even observed to migrate into the nucleus (XREF_FIG), whereas an increase in Sirt1 limited cyt-c leakage.
evidence: HG increased the leakage of cyt-c
